title: Peanut Butter Kisses
description: Josh Boothe is one of the best pastry chefs in the nation, but he chooses to work as Peter Summers' assistant, creating elaborate and beautiful pieces of art from sugar. He knows Peter is the best, and he wants to do everything possible to ensure Peter earns the gold medal he deserves at the California Confectioners Pastry Competition. Unfortunately, they've placed second three years in a row, and Josh fears Peter will find a new assistant. But Peter has no interest in getting rid of Josh. In fact, he wants to find a way to make their partnership permanent...  Gay / Contemporary
author: Pepper Espinoza
